attributes.action: I would like all MPs expenses cut . And all wages to minimum wage
attributes.additional_details:
Our country is in shambles .
There are Constant worries about how to get by. 
Worries about how to get food and heat our homes .
Worries about housing, lack of jobs.
Worries about putting clothes on children's backs.
Mps have gveen given another pay rise to almost 95000 a year more than 3x what most people in the country earn and that's not including all the expensise they get to write off.
They do not need more than minimum wage for there job if they disagree then they need to explain why
attributes.background:
I want all Members of parliament to have there wages cut to minimum wage .
Then all there expenses taken from them . Including food allowance. Heating allowance , there second homes ,and the subsided meals. They should have nothing above a minimum wage worker

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government. 
 
You can find out more about IPSA here: http://www.theipsa.org.uk
